title: Gigd
author: Gigd
content: https://gigd.xyz/ a Bitcoin friendly service marketplace.5% marketplace fee.$50 rebatable & refundable vendor bond.Let us know what you guys think.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Quote from: Gigd on November 17, 2023, 08:39:45 PMhttps://gigd.xyz/ a Bitcoin friendly service marketplace.5% marketplace fee.$50 rebatable & refundable vendor bond.Let us know what you guys think.Welcome to bitcointalk platform. Nice having you here. I checked your website and it is alright. I saw were you demanded for $50 membership fee for vendors and if I may ask you this question were you asked to pay any membership fee as you registered here? This platform is very much bigger and well recognised than your site with lots of job opportunities, people learning and also imparting other members here free of charge. People are also hired here and paid for their services. Lots of skills are learnt here, people get educative materials here, connections and other important information Al gotten here free of charge. What if someone does as it is written on your website and does not get anything in return what would be the outcome as I am not convinced with what you have written here.

What if someone does as it is written on your website and does not get anything in return what would be the outcome as I am not convinced with what you have written here.Thank you for welcoming us to bitcointalk.org! We believe in launching fast and often. We are still in the dawn of building our platform, and that is why the value we offer may not be evident yet. However, we are working hard to improve our platform and provide more value to our users.We do not charge any membership fees for users to register on our platform and buy services, the fee is only charged when you want to post a job and/or want to list your service.The $50 membership fee for vendors, is charged to prevent bad actors from abusing our platform. We understand that this may be a concern for some users, but we believe that it is necessary to maintain a High quality platform.We appreciate your feedback and hope that you will give our platform a chance. We are committed to providing a safe and valuable platform for our users, and we are always looking for ways to improve. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to us.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: You should have chosen a better domain, this .xyz sounds like not serious honestly and that's why we barely see those real marketplaces that have this domain. Moving on, if someone sees this $50 bond thing, they'd definitely going to flee away from your marketplace. Even if you say that it's refundable. Someone who just seen a platform that has this amount of charge for freelancers and employers will definitely choose the other platforms where they don't need to have such bonds to avail their services.

comments.author: Gigd
comments.body: Quote from: CryptSafe on November 17, 2023, 09:01:54 PMQuote from: Gigd on November 17, 2023, 08:39:45 PMhttps://gigd.xyz/ a Bitcoin friendly service marketplace.5% marketplace fee.$50 rebatable & refundable vendor bond.Let us know what you guys think.Welcome to bitcointalk platform. Nice having you here. I checked your website and it is alright. I saw were you demanded for $50 membership fee for vendors and if I may ask you this question were you asked to pay any membership fee as you registered here? This platform is very much bigger and well recognised than your site with lots of job opportunities, people learning and also imparting other members here free of charge. People are also hired here and paid for their services. Lots of skills are learnt here, people get educative materials here, connections and other important information Al gotten here free of charge. What if someone does as it is written on your website and does not get anything in return what would be the outcome as I am not convinced with what you have written here.Let’s take a look at some examples to understand this better:Example 1: You want to list a PR campaign service and charge $1000 per PR campaign. You pay the vendor bond of $50 to list your service. After you pay the vendor bond, you realize that there is a huge market for your service. You make your first sale and receive the full $1000. Then, you make your second sale of $1000 and receive 95% ($950) because your vendor bond is fully refunded. When you close your account, you will receive $0 as your vendor bond has already been refunded by giving you    $50 discount.Example 2: You want to list a shout-out service and charge $100 per shout-out. You pay the vendor bond of $50 to list your service. When you make your first sale of $100, you will receive the full amount instead of being charged the market fee of 5%. If you don’t make any sales after your first sale, you can close your account and get the remainder of $45.Example 3: You want to list a logo design service and charge $100 per logo design. You pay the vendor bond of $50 to list your service. After you pay the vendor bond, you realize that there is no market for your service. You can close your account and get a refund of $50.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: The service is 1 day old and asks for a $50 guarantee to post every offer, I don't know if that's a good market for scammers to exploit early, the only questionable reputation is the marketplace itself.As a freelancer on several other platforms, I actually want to register but am just waiting for the time. Just wanted to hear the first evaluation from the owner after a few months on whether this policy will result in a thriving freelance marketplace.Goodluck.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: Gigd on November 17, 2023, 09:37:18 PMThe $50 membership fee for vendors, is charged to prevent bad actors from abusing our platform. We understand that this may be a concern for some users, but we believe that it is necessary to maintain a High quality platform.Paying fees to prevent misuse is an ugly excuse, and even for well-known services, membership fees give distinctive conditions, such as the ability to pin a post, publish in a specific board, or some paid features, but most of the features must be free, the first of which is publishing a job and/or wishing to list your service.Start with free service and paid features. The exact opposite happens in our world today, as services attract customers by paying them fees.

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: Gigd on November 17, 2023, 09:37:18 PMThe $50 membership fee for vendors, is charged to prevent bad actors from abusing our platform.But it's not going to provide protection for any of the listings that are higher than that amount [unfortunately, it'd only give a false sense of security].Quote from: Gigd on November 17, 2023, 10:28:17 PMThen, you make your second sale of $1000 and receive 95% ($950) because your vendor bond is fully refunded.If you're capable of controlling and adjusting the amounts [indirect payments], then there's no point in asking for the $50 membership fee!
